sentence.Network_en: France is abundantly supplied with excellent family-run hotels.
sentence.Network_cn: 法国有很多相当不错的家庭旅馆。

sentence.Network_en: She made her wishes abundantly clear.
sentence.Network_cn: 她充分表明了她的意愿。

sentence.Network_en: It is both cheap and abundantly available.
sentence.Network_cn: 它不仅便宜而且产量丰富.

list.abs: It is both cheap and abundantly available ., 它不仅便宜而且产量丰富.
原文字义 「杀害」屠宰；「毁坏」除灭，失去；「得」发现，找到；「更丰盛」格外丰厚，充盈有余，超越需要(super abundantly)。 …
昭什么时候读四声_百度知道 ... 2. 昭然[ obvious] 3. 昭然若揭[ abundantly clear] 4. 昭示[ make clear to all].
百花缭乱（Flowers abundantly）介绍百花缭乱（Flowers abundantly）（Flowers Abundantly），网络游戏《地下城与勇士》职业气功师觉醒后的称谓。 以虚祖为中心的一些格斗家 …

entry.def: If something is abundantly clear, it is extremely obvious.

example.ex: He made it abundantly clear that anybody who disagrees with his policies will not last long.
example.tran: 他非常明确地表示任何不同意他政策的人都坚持不了多久。

entry.def: Something that occurs abundantly is present in large quantities.

example.ex: ...a plant that grows abundantly in the United States...
example.tran: 在美国大量生长的一种植物

example.ex: All the pages are abundantly illustrated with colour photographs.
example.tran: 每页都配有丰富的彩色照片。

auth_sentence.content: This decision has been abundantly vindicated by the results.
auth_sentence.res_content: This decision has been abundantly vindicated by the results.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This decision has been abundantly vindicated by the results.

auth_sentence.content: Ferdinand tweeted that afternoon, making his thoughts abundantly clear.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ferdinand tweeted that afternoon, making his thoughts abundantly clear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ferdinand tweeted that afternoon, making his thoughts abundantly clear.

auth_sentence.content: One listen and it becomes abundantly clear.
auth_sentence.res_content: One listen and it becomes abundantly clear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One listen and it becomes abundantly clear.

sentences.en: It is both cheap and abundantly available.
sentences.cn: 它不仅便宜而且产量丰富。

sentences.en: Calcium is found most abundantly in milk.
She made her wishes abundantly clear.
sentences.cn: 她充分表明了她的意思。
